content_descriptors.notes: The characters depicted in this game are all adults. It contains explicit adult themes, including female nudity, erotic content, mild violence, alcohol abuse,and non-consensual sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.

name: 调酒大师 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)

supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
